title: Match History
body: Is there an issue with match history at the moment? Because the when i click on it in the client for individual games the popup window in my browser shows formatting issues and when I try to look at my full match history it redirects me to EUW and I can't log in to view it.

replies.body:
Hi Maeigwnn,

Thanks for reporting this.  We did actually find an issue with our match history over the weekend, which was causing the behaviour you saw (being redirected to EUW match history).

This should be fixed up now though, so let us know if you are still seeing the problem.

Cheers!
Mindstar

I for one know that your region is **not** dictated by the url you use to visit League. You can be on oce.leagueoflegends but still on the EUW boards. I'm not 100% sure how to fix this but I find that meddling around with the region selection enough eventually fixes it.

But what is the strangest is that your account is on OCE, not EUW, so there shouldn't be *anything* appearing for you there. Did you ever transfer your account from region to region?
im getting same stuff pretty annoying. It looks isolated to OCE match history page
